aspect.name: cm:personDisabled
aspect.title: Person Disabled
aspect.description: Indicates that a cm:person type has been disabled.

property.name: cm:autoVersionOnUpdateProps
property.title: Auto Version - on update properties only

property.name: cm:fiveStarRatingSchemeCount
property.title: Five Star Rating Scheme ratings count

property.name: cm:fiveStarRatingSchemeTotal
property.title: Five Star Rating Scheme ratings total

aspect.name: rn:preventRenditions
aspect.title: Marker aspect to prevent the creation of renditions for a node.

property.name: audio:sampleType
property.title: Sample Type
property.description: Audio Sample Type, typically one of 8Int, 16Int, 32Int or 32Float

property.name: audio:channelType
property.title: Channel Type
property.description: Audio Channel Type, typically one of Mono, Stereo, 5.1 or 7.1

property.name: audio:compressor
property.title: Compressor
property.description: Audio Compressor Used, such as MP3 or FLAC
